DataElement.preferredName: Participant Randomization Protocol Treatment Arm Investigator Best Practice Ramucirumab Intent To Treat Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response indicating whether the participant will include Ramucirumab as part of their care if randomized to Arm A, the Investigator's Choice of Standard of Care?

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Randomization Protocol Treatment Arm Investigator Best Practice Ramucirumab Intent To Treat
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study._An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements._An informed treatment recommendation that is expected to be helpful to the greatest number of people within a certain patient group._A recombinant, fully human monoclonal antibody directed against human vascular endothelial growth factor receptor 2 (VEGFR-2) with antiangiogenesis activity. Ramucirumab specifically binds to and inhibits VEGFR-2, which may result in an inhibition of tumor angiogenesis and a decrease in tumor nutrient supply. VEGFR-2 is a pro-angiogenic growth factor receptor tyrosine kinase expressed by endothelial cells._The use of a particular medical device, medication or treatment to treat a pre-existing disease or condition.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Randomization Protocol Treatment Arm Investigator Best Practice Ramucirumab Intent To Treat
Property.preferredDefinition: The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study._An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements._An informed treatment recommendation that is expected to be helpful to the greatest number of people within a certain patient group._A recombinant, fully human monoclonal antibody directed against human vascular endothelial growth factor receptor 2 (VEGFR-2) with antiangiogenesis activity. Ramucirumab specifically binds to and inhibits VEGFR-2, which may result in an inhibition of tumor angiogenesis and a decrease in tumor nutrient supply. Concepts.definition: The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.
A specific treatment plan within a clinical trial that describes the activities a subject will be involved in as he or she progresses through the study.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
An informed treatment recommendation that is expected to be helpful to the greatest number of people within a certain patient group.

A recombinant, fully human monoclonal antibody directed against human vascular endothelial growth factor receptor 2 (VEGFR-2) with antiangiogenesis activity. Ramucirumab specifically binds to and inhibits VEGFR-2, which may result in an inhibition of tumor angiogenesis and a decrease in tumor nutrient supply. VEGFR-2 is a pro-angiogenic growth factor receptor tyrosine kinase expressed by endothelial cells.
The use of a particular medical device, medication or treatment to treat a pre-existing disease or condition.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant plan to use Ramucirumab as part of standard of care if randomized to Arm A Investigator's Choice of Standard of Care?
